actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to authorize cost-of-living adjustments of annuities under the retired serviceman's family protection plan and to provide that remarriage of a spouse at or after age 60 shall not result in termination of annuity.

summary.text: Stipulates that the remarriage of the spouse of a deceased member of the armed forces at or after the age of 60 shall not result in the termination of the annuity payable under the Retired Serviceman's Family Protection Plan. Authorizes cost-of-living adjustments in such annuities.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to authorize cost-of-living adjustments of annuities under the retired serviceman's family protection plan and to provide that remarriage of a spouse at or after age 60 shall not result in termination of annuity.
